programme.title: Food Secrets - EP 2 料理的秘密

programme.title: My Wonderful Life - EP 79 我的灿烂人生

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Girl Gone Missing
programme.desc: Public Prosecutor Mehringer has been dealt a tough hand in his case against the Ukrainian arms trafficker Artem Lazarev: his most important witness is supposed to die. Investigator Sarah Kohr helps to stage the witness’ death, but all is not as they seem.

programme.title: Penny Bank
programme.desc: Middle aged Orhan is struggling with every aspect of his life: he has to take care of his comatose mother, he is in debt, he cannot fulfill his role as a father, and he has to juggle multiple jobs. Eventually, he has to make an impossible decision…

programme.title: Murders in Toulouse
programme.desc: Several corpses are found scattered across Toulouse, with evidence strangely linked to a particular song’s lyrics. Captain Keller, a veteran inspector ravaged by an illness, teams up with a young officer, who has secrets of her own, to solve the case.

programme.title: To My Beloved
programme.desc: Fernando is a good man who takes care of his only child, Daniel. Following the death of his wife Ana, every night Fernando recalls their love as he sorts out his beloved dead spouse’s belongings. One day he finds a VHS tape that will change everything.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death
programme.desc: In a sealed factory with the highest security precautions, the destruction of deadly substances is underway. However, the lead chemist is kidnapped along with a canister of Sarin gas - an invisible and odourless poison that kills within minutes.

programme.title: Torch
programme.desc: In a war zone, two sisters, stuck in a basement while waiting for their father, attempt to distract themselves from the desperation of their situation by playing games and recounting old stories.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: Stormskerry Maja
programme.desc: At 17, Maja marries humble fisherman Janne and starts a family on the remote island of Stormskerry, where survival is a constant challenge. Amidst the hardships, Maja awakens to her potential, finding resilience and a love that transcends life and death.

programme.title: The Takeover
programme.desc: Cédric works in a company specialized in precision mechanics. Its management, run by an investment fund, is disastrous. As another fund is about to buy it again, Cédric decides to take the company over, giving it to the employees.

programme.title: East Frisian: Atonement
programme.desc: Detective Ann Kathrin Klaasen grapples with her father's unsolved murder, which still haunts her after fifteen years. After much urging from her concerned partner Frank Wellerto to seek help, she heads to a doctor, where she notices a clue in the office.

programme.title: Passenger 23
programme.desc: Martin, a police psychologist who lost his wife and his son during a vacation, receives a call that brings new clues about the disappearance of his family and returns to the same cruise ship to discover the truth.

programme.title: The Boss and The Cutie
programme.desc: Totò is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the other’s body.

programme.title: The Kiss (OTO)
programme.desc: In 1913 Denmark, young officer Anton grapples with duty and love when he befriends Baron von Løvenskjold's daughter, Edith, confined to a wheelchair. As their bond deepens, Anton is ensnared in a web of promises and lies, torn between pity and true love.

programme.title: East Frisian: Fire
programme.desc: Detectives Klaasen and Weller's are finally getting married. But their honeymoon is cut short when a corpse is found in bonfire ashes. As bodies pile up, they chase a serial killer through a town celebrating Easter, unraveling a dark mystery.
